alert.note: Alert for Isabella; Mecosta; Montcalm; Newaygo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Newaygo, Isabella, Mecosta and northern Montcalm Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hesperia to 7 miles northeast of Newaygo to near Canadian Lakes. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant... Big Rapids... Clare... Newaygo... Stanton... White Cloud... Fremont... Howard City... Shepherd... Edmore... Lakeview... Hesperia... Grant... Morley... Mecosta... Rosebush... Lake Isabella... Canadian Lakes... Croton... Bridgeton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to ponding of water. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
